snippet: One of the original reality shows of TV, “Cops” will be shown in the same Saturday night time slot on Spike, which sees the program as perfect for its audience.
abstract: Reality television show Cops moves to cable channel Spike TV after 24 years on Fox network.
lead_paragraph: One of the original reality shows of TV, “Cops” will be shown in the same Saturday night time slot on Spike, which sees the program as perfect for its audience.

headline.main: Long a Staple of Fox, ‘Cops’ Lands in the Eager Arms of Spike TV
